scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.render-build: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev --prefix frontend & npm run dev --prefix backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup:env: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('backend/.env')) { fs.copyFileSync('backend/.env', '.env'); console.log('✅ Environment variables copied'); } else { console.log('❌ backend/.env not found'); }"
